thread.title: Ahmad Kanawati
thread.title_full: Pixels Logo Design reviewed by Ahmad Kanawati

author: Ahmad Kanawati
title: Ahmad Kanawati
text:
I had one of the best customer service experience from Pixels Logo Design, special thanks to (Alison, and Lisa) from the customer service department for their efforts.
so far i have worked with them on two projects and indeed would recommend them.
Thank you Pixels Logo Design!
